Question.Subject: Which is the website for downloading free instrumental music/background music?
Question.Content: I'm making a video and I'll need some music to go in the background that is instrumental. I'll need it for free
Question.ChosenAnswer: Youtube.Go to this website http://www.freedvdsoftware.com/ So copy and paste the Youtube URL link on the link to wherever you want to download it to.

Answer.Content: Youtube.Go to this website http://www.freedvdsoftware.com/ So copy and paste the Youtube URL link on the link to wherever you want to download it to.
http://www.freeplaymusic.com is great for that kind of stuff. They have different categories so you can find exactly what you're looking for!
